relics.name: Brave Explorer
relics.description: Each combat, the first time you end your turn without Block apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A brave Explorer

relics.name: Calm Explorer
relics.description: Draw 1 card and gain [E] at the start of every fight.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Docile Explorer
relics.description: When you receive a Debuff, gain 2 Block on the following turn.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Hardy Explorer
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each turn, gain 5 Block. If this HP loss was from a monster's attack, do not remove your Block at the start of the next turn.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Impish Explorer
relics.description: The first time you evoke an orb each combat, gain 1 Focus.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Jolly Explorer
relics.description: Start each combat with an Agility.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Naive Explorer
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have not taken any damage from attacks this combat, your next Attack deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Nature Related Relic
relics.description: You will receive a relic that depends on your nature.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Quirky Explorer
relics.description: Gain 5% more Gold in combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Relaxed Explorer
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Scry 1.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Timid Explorer
relics.description: At the end of each turn, if you have any leftover energy, spend 1 and retain a card.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Fire Gem
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 10 Burn to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: This gem is imbued with the essence of fire and will boost the power of a Fire-type moves, but only once.

relics.name: Leftovers
relics.description: At the end of each combat heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Some food left from your last meal

relics.name: Water Gem
relics.description: When you deal more than 20 attack damage in a single hit, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: This gem is imbued with the essence of water and will boost the power of a Water-type moves, but only once.

relics.name: Black Glasses
relics.description: At the start of each turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to their Strength.
relics.flavorText: It's a pair of shady- looking glasses that boost the power of the holder's Dark-type moves.

relics.name: Grassy Seed
relics.description: At the start of combat add a random attack to your draw pile. It costs 0 this combat.
relics.flavorText: It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain.

relics.name: Charcoal
relics.description: Every time you apply a debuff deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

relics.name: Big Root
relics.description: Whenever you are at 70% or less of your max HP, gain Recovery.
relics.flavorText: What is this?

relics.name: Light Ball
relics.description: Once per turn, when you play a power and you are not in a stance, gain 1 orb slot.
relics.flavorText: It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

relics.name: Amulet Coin
relics.description: Cards no longer cost you money in combat. At the start of your turn, spend 20 gold.
relics.flavorText: It doubles any prize money received as long as the holder joins the battle at least once.

relics.name: Cell Battery
relics.description:
The Charge Meter will now have 3 steps between stances.
You no longer return to the center of the charge meter at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

relics.name: Flame Plate
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, trigger an Eruption on ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: This stone tablet is imbued with the essence of fire and boosts the power of the holder's Fire-type moves.

relics.name: Life Orb
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, exhaust a random card from your hand.
relics.flavorText: It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

relics.name: Meadow Plate
relics.description: Gain 20 max HP. At the start of combat if you have more than 65% of your max HP lose HP until you have 65% of your max HP. If you have less than 65% of your max HP, heal 10 HP.
relics.flavorText: A stone tablet imbued with the essence of plants. When used on a certain Pokmon, it allows that Pokmon to gain the power of the Grass type.

relics.name: Metronome
relics.description: At the start of each turn add a random card from a Pokmon that is not in your team to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
relics.flavorText: It follows its own rhythm.

relics.name: Miracle Seed
relics.description: Every time you apply 3 Debuffs in a single turn draw a card.
relics.flavorText: Its a seed invued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

relics.name: Mystic Water
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Reduce your maximum hand size by 2.
relics.flavorText: This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

relics.name: Splash Plate
relics.description: The first time you evoke an Orb each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This stone tablet is imbued with the essence of water and boosts the power of the holder's Water-type moves.

relics.name: Wave Incense
relics.description: During combat, ALL cards you create are upgraded.
relics.flavorText: This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

potions.name: Aspear Berry
potions.description: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw 2 cards.

potions.name: Aux Power
potions.description: Your next attack deals 10 more damage.

potions.name: Meowth Candy
potions.description: Spend 20 gold. Do the effects of 2 random Potions.

potions.name: Elixir
potions.description: Gain [E] [E] [E] . Add 2 Burn to your hand.

potions.name: Rawst Berry
potions.description: Apply 15 Burn. Burn stacks don't decrease for 1 turn on the target.

potions.name: X Attack
potions.description: Add 3 Flinch to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

potions.name: Dire Hit
potions.description: Your next attack deals double damage.

potions.name: Leppa Berry
potions.description: Choose 2 cards to retain at the end of your turn.

potions.name: Sitrus Berry
potions.description: Put 1 card from your exhaust pile in your hand.

potions.name: X Sp. Attack
potions.description: Fill all your Orb slots with Lightning.

keywords.name: Asleep
keywords.description: When an enemy is asleep, it will not act until it receives damage. When it receives damage, it will go back to the intent it had before sleeping.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: For each 5 stacks, enemy deals 1 less damage. Decreases by a third of all stacks at the end of the round.

keywords.name: Claw
keywords.description: Any card with "Claw" in its name counts as a claw.

keywords.name: Eruption
keywords.description: Deal damage to the target equal to the amount of Burn stacks on the target. Remove all Burn stacks.

keywords.name: Evasiveness Drop
keywords.description: At the end of the round, enemy loses 50% of their Block.

keywords.name: Inert
keywords.description: This card will not affect the Charge-Meter.

keywords.name: Leech Seed
keywords.description: At the start of their turn, for each Leech Seed the enemy has, it loses 1 HP, and you gain 1 HP. At the end of the turn, if the leech seed's owner has not taken any damage from any other source, the amount is reduced by half.

keywords.name: Negative Stance
keywords.description:
The first 2 Skill played each turn will grant you 1 Focus each.
When you exit this Stance, evoke your next 2 Orbs.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the number of Plated Armor Stacks. Reduce this amount by one evertime you take damage from an enemies attack.

keywords.name: Pledge Card
keywords.description:
Pledge Cards are Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge and Water Pledge.
Fire+Grass: 9 Poison to ALL enemies. Fire+Water: 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Grass+Water: 2 Weak to ALL enemies. Grass+Grass: Gain 1 Thorns. Fire+Fire: Gain 1 energy. Water+Water: Gain 3 Temporary Strength.

keywords.name: Poison Thorns
keywords.description: Every time you get attacked, attacker receives Poison.

keywords.name: Positive Stance
keywords.description:
When you play an Attack, channel 1 Lightning if you have any empty Orb slot.
When you exit this stance, gain 7 Block.

keywords.name: Recovery
keywords.description:
When you receives damage, increase the number of Recovery stacks by as much damage you received.
When you deal attack damage, heal 30% of the attack damage dealt up to the number of Recovery stacks you had last turn.

keywords.name: Rest
keywords.description: You cannot play cards that target the enemy.

keywords.name: Scoop-Up
keywords.description: At the start of your turn but after you draw, if this card is in your discard pile add it to the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Temporary HP
keywords.description: Additional defense that will take damage instead of your HP. It acts like HP. You keep Temporary HP between turns but not between rooms.

keywords.name: Temporary Vigor
keywords.description: Gain Vigor, but lose Vigor at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Toxic
keywords.description: Poison on enemies affected by Toxic go up by the amount of stack instead of going down.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next attack deals 1 more damage per Vigor stack (before applying powers like Vulnerable and such).

mods.name: Mystery Dungeon
mods.description: One last Dungeon for brave monsters from another world
